column4: i got a problem with my ubuntu server, for some reason when i type sudo command it asks me for a password but after that nothing happens
it just goes back to the command problpt
can i enable root account without sudo command?
: i guess check forums for related problems, maybe a fix.. maybe a corrupt sudo, i dunno
: well at the time i was new and just did a clean install :(
: but you still have to find out whats wrong with sudo
: the su -c <command> <loginname> will run command for you maybe
: i dunno what else to say...
